title: Schema
description: An object defining classes and enums.

name.description: The name of the schema. The string is UTF-8 encoded.

description.description: The description of the schema. The string is UTF-8 encoded.

classes.description: A dictionary, where each key is a class ID and each value is an object defining the class.

enums.description: A dictionary, where each key is an enum ID and each value is an object defining the values for the enum.
